articles.title: Cyclist hurt in Bukit Batok accident awarded record $13.6m payout - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - A Swiss national, who suffered traumatic brain injuries after a car crashed into his bicycle, was awarded over $13.6 million in damages by the High Court. It is believed to be a record sum for personal injury claims. Mr Christian Joachim Pollmann,…
articles.content:
